dcterms:description: A long-term clinical trial database of a tetraplegic patient executing motor imagery tasks for 3D hand translation, consisting of 44 experimental sessions recorded over more than 200 days, with a total of 300 minutes for left hand translation and 284 minutes for right hand translation.
dcterms:title: Long-term clinical trial database of a tetraplegic patient executing motor imagery tasks for 3D hand translation

dcterms:description: The BCI and Tetraplegia clinical trial dataset, which includes data from a clinical trial identified by ClinicalTrials.gov identifier: NCT02550522, focusing on the control of an exoskeleton by a tetraplegic patient through a brain-machine interface.
dcterms:title: BCI and Tetraplegia clinical trial dataset

dcterms:creator: M. ´Sliwowski
M. Martin
A. Souloumiac
P. Blanchart
T. Aksenova
dcterms:description: An ECoG dataset for decoding motor imagery signals using hand-crafted time-frequency features, aimed at analyzing the effectiveness of different deep learning architectures for motor imagery decoding.
dcterms:title: ECoG dataset for decoding motor imagery signals with hand-crafted time-frequency features
